page.title: 03EDUCATION BUILDING AND STAFF
page.content: Our school is a new building built in 1976.About seventy-four children attend it.It has four teachers and a lady nursery assistant.A lady teacher comes to give violin lessons to some pupils every week and also a man comes to teach wind instruments.There are four classrooms in the building.We have an open area for assembly,pottery and painting.We also have a small library.We have a community centre where we eat lunch,have P.E. and drama A Welsh teacher comes twice a week to teach the Welch learners.A special teacher comes twice a week to help the slow learners with their languages.Our school is a small school and the children transfer to Ysgol Bro Ddyfi at eleven years of age .
